CustomField.description: First installment based on billing frequency and prorated total; one-off charges fully due in first payment
CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT(Billing_Frequency__c), "Monthly", ((Total_Payment_Due__c - IF(ISNULL(One_Off_Charges__c), 0, One_Off_Charges__c)) / CEILING(BLANKVALUE(Term_Length_Months__c, 12))) + IF(ISNULL(One_Off_Charges__c), 0, One_Off_Charges__c), "Quarterly", ((Total_Payment_Due__c - IF(ISNULL(One_Off_Charges__c), 0, One_Off_Charges__c)) / CEILING(BLANKVALUE(Term_Length_Months__c, 12) / 3)) + IF(ISNULL(One_Off_Charges__c), 0, One_Off_Charges__c), "Semi-Annual", ((Total_Payment_Due__c - IF(ISNULL(One_Off_Charges__c), 0, One_Off_Charges__c)) / CEILING(BLANKVALUE(Term_Length_Months__c, 12) / 6)) + IF(ISNULL(One_Off_Charges__c), 0, One_Off_Charges__c), "Annually", Total_Payment_Due__c, "One-time", Total_Payment_Due__c, Total_Payment_Due__c )
CustomField.label: First Payment Due
